jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Please note that we will never request payment or bank account information at any stage of the recruitment process. As we continue to grow our teams, we urge you to be cautious of fraudulent job postings or recruitment activities that misuse our company name and information. Please protect your personal information during any recruitment process. While Monks may contact potential candidates via LinkedIn, all applications must be submitted through our official website (monks.com/careers).DescriptionAs a Senior Data Scientist at Monks, you’ll help shape and deliver cutting-edge data solutions that power intelligent, personalised experiences for some of the world’s most influential brands. You’ll lead the design, development, and deployment of Machine Learning (ML) and Generative AI (GenAI) solutions that deliver measurable business impact, from predictive audience modelling to agentic automation systems, connecting data, intelligence, and action. You’ll work across the full data lifecycle, from ingestion and transformation to model orchestration and real-time activation, building the foundations that enable adaptive, insight-driven experiences at scaleYou will partner with UX leads, data scientists and creative technologists, bridging the gap between data engineering, applied machine learning, and emerging agentic workflows. You’ll define and enforce standards that ensure that data, models, and automation pipelines are scalable, resilient, and fully governed at runtime. You’ll shape the technical architecture for AI-driven systems that can reason, act, and learn autonomously across complex digital environments, connecting real-time data, contextual intelligence, and orchestration layers to deliver faster, more adaptive, and continuously improving customer experiences.You bring a solid foundation in modern cloud ecosystems (GCP, AWS, or Azure), data warehousing (BigQuery, Snowflake, etc.), and advanced ETL/ELT orchestration. Your deep understanding of machine learning and automation frameworks enables you to architect and operationalize predictive models, recommender systems, and agent-assisted optimization workflows.This Netherlands-based role supports our Interactive team in delivering data-driven innovation for a major Dutch client. You’ll work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment at the forefront of AI, automation, and digital experience design, where your technical expertise helps connect data, creativity, and performance.If you’re passionate about engineering intelligence from data and advancing autonomous, adaptive systems, we’d love to meet you.Responsibilities      Lead the design, development, and deployment of advanced Machine Learning (ML) and Generative AI (GenAI) models on cloud platforms such as GCP and AWS, ensuring they are scalable, resilient, and compliant with enterprise standards.Architect and implement predictive frameworks, including propensity, churn, and recommendation models, translating analytical results into measurable business impact.Design and operationalise GenAI architectures using APIs (e.g., OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic) and frameworks like LangChain or LlamaIndex, integrating them into production-grade workflows.Define data science standards and modelling pipelines, including feature engineering, data versioning, and reproducibility practices using tools such as dbt and Dataform.Oversee data integration and transformation workflows, automating ingestion and orchestration across APIs, cloud services, and real-time data pipelines. Establish MLOps best practices for continuous delivery, monitoring, and retraining of models in production environments.Ensure governance, observability, and documentation across all machine learning assets, adhering to internal standards for reproducibility, ethics, and security.Design and evaluate experimental frameworks (A/B, multivariate, or causal) to measure model impact, validate hypotheses, and translate insights into actionable optimization strategies.Inspire and guide data engineers, UX strategists, and creative technologists in translating data and AI into intelligent, human-centered digital experiences.Communicate complex analytical outcomes through clear visualisations and narratives, influencing technical and non-technical stakeholders alike.
Requirements      MSc in a quantitative discipline such as Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.4+ years of professional experience applying data science in production environments, ideally across marketing, product, or customer-experience domains.Proven ability to design, develop, and deploy scalable machine learning and GenAI solutions on cloud platforms such as GCP or AWS.Experience working in cloud-native data ecosystems, including data warehousing (BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift) and modelling frameworks such as dbt or Dataform.Deep understanding of statistical inference, machine learning algorithms, and experimental design, with the ability to translate analytical outcomes into actionable recommendations.Practical experience integrating APIs and automation frameworks (e.g., LangChain, Airflow, Cloud Functions) for data and AI orchestration. Familiarity with MLOps principles, including CI/CD pipelines, model versioning, and continuous monitoring in production.Demonstrated ability to communicate complex concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders, influencing strategy and decision-making.Strong analytical, problem-solving, and collaborative leadership skills, with the ability to mentor others and drive cross-disciplinary innovation.Professional cloud certification (e.g. Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer or Machine Learning Engineer, AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty, or Azure Data Scientist Associate).Native-level Dutch and fluent in English, both written and spoken.
Preferred Requirements      Experience in consultancy or agency environments, leading end-to-end data science initiatives across multiple clients, industries, and stakeholder ecosystems.Applied experience with GenAI or LLM-based systems, such as retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), prompt engineering, or embedding-based personalisation.Familiarity with ML governance and Responsible AI principles, including model monitoring, bias mitigation, and explainability.Familiarity with marketing and behavioural ioral data, including analytics platforms and media performance data from digital advertising ecosystems.Understanding of digital marketing and advertising industry practices across client verticals such as retail, finance, and government.Contributions to the data or AI community (e.g., open-source projects, publications, conference talks) are a strong plus.
About MonksMonks is the global, purely digital, unitary operating brand of S4Capital plc. With a legacy of innovation and specialized expertise, Monks combines an extraordinary range of global marketing and technology services to accelerate business possibilities and redefine how brands and businesses interact with the world. Its integration of systems and workflows delivers unfettered content production, scaled experiences, enterprise-grade technology and data science fueled by AI—managed by the industry’s best and most diverse digital talent—to help the world’s trailblazing companies outmaneuver and outpace their competition.Monks was named a Contender in The Forrester Wave™: Global Marketing Services. It has remained a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-23), ranks among Cannes Lions' Top 10 Creative Companies (2022-23) and is the only partner to have been placed in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players list every year (2020-24). In addition to being named Adweek’s first AI Agency of the Year (2023), Monks has been recognized by Business Intelligence in its 2024 Excellence in Artificial Intelligence Awards program in three categories: the Individual category, Organizational Winner in AI Strategic Planning and AI Product for its service Monks.Flow. Monks has also garnered the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-24), won a record number of FWAs and has earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023.We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us.

jobs.title: Cloud consultant
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Cloud consultant bij Netflex Wil jij organisaties helpen om hun digitale werkplek veilig, slim en toekomstbestendig te maken? Ben jij thuis in Microsoft 365 en Azure of wil je daar specialist in worden? Dan is deze rol echt iets voor jou.Waarom Netflex?Wij zijn een enthousiast en betrokken team dat werkt aan moderne cloudoplossingen. Geen bureaucratie, maar korte lijnen en een informele sfeer waarin jouw ideeën welkom zijn. We begeleiden organisaties in overheid, educatie, zorg en commerciële sector met werkplekken die altijd beschikbaar, veilig en gebruiksvriendelijk zijn. En dat ondersteund door adoptie, beheer, Automation en AI.Onze open cultuur draait om vertrouwen, samenwerking en groei. We geven ruimte om te leren, dagen elkaar uit en vieren successen samen. We zoeken mensen die nieuwsgierig zijn, initiatief tonen verantwoordelijkheid nemen.Onze kernwaarden in jouw werk      Passie voor IT: Technologie is ons vak, mensen staan centraal. We ontwikkelen slimme oplossingen, helpen klanten en blijven leren. Avontuur door vertrouwen: We groeien, durven en pakken kansen. Dat doen we met vertrouwen in elkaar, onze klanten en onszelf. Succes door samenwerking: Samen kom je verder. We werken als één team, delen kennis en vieren successen. Innovatie door ervaring: We combineren jarenlange ervaring met een nieuwsgierige blik vooruit. We blijven vernieuwen, verbeteren en zoeken actief naar slimme oplossingen.
Jouw rol      Adviseer klanten over Microsoft 365 en Azure.Implementeer, migreer en optimaliseer cloudomgevingen.Richt moderne werkplekken en securityoplossingen in.Vertaal klantbehoeften naar slimme, schaalbare oplossingen.Deel kennis via workshops en presentaties.Blijf op de hoogte van de nieuwste IT-trends.
Jouw profiel      Ruimte ervaring met Microsoft 365 en Azure (of ambitie om dit te leren).Communicatief sterk en klantgericht.Analytisch, oplossingsgericht en leergierig.Certificeringen zoals AZ-104 en AZ-305? Pluspunt!
Wat bieden wij jou?      Uitdagende projecten bij diverse klanten. Ruimte voor groei, training en certificering. Samenwerken in een deskundig en enthousiast team. Informele werksfeer met korte lijnen. Marktconform salaris en goede secundaire voorwaarden. Gezellige teamactiviteiten en kennissessies.
Klaar om jouw volgende stap te zetten? Solliciteer direct en ontdek hoe leuk werken bij Netflex is!

Je ICT-omgeving houden we met onze professionele supportafdeling tevens net zo schoon, veilig én van hoge kwaliteit. Bovendien staat bij Netflex de eindgebruiker altijd centraal. Zo behoud je te allen tijde zelf de controle en bepaal je wie welke data mag zien en gebruiken binnen je organisatie. Van zorg tot overheid en van zakelijke dienstverlening tot ICT in het onderwijs. Wij regelen het voor je. Dat is Netflex. unlimIT your business®!Daarom een ICT-omgeving van Netflex: - jouw medewerkers staan centraal, - expert op het gebied van adoptietrajecten,  - team van ervaren en gedreven professionals, - plenty succesvolle business cases, - altijd afgestemd op jouw digitale behoeftes, - altijd voorzien van de laatste trends op ICT-gebied, - voor een écht veilige, duurzame en betrouwbare ICT-omgeving, - voor volledig beheer van deze ICT-omgeving, - snelle, moderne en overal bereikbare digitale werkplekken, - voor een nog betere werksfeer én productievere medewerkers, - 24x7 professionele support,  - al sinds jaar en dag Microsoft Gold Certified Partner.

jobs.title: Solution Architect - Agentic Solutions (Zurich)
jobs.description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Iris.ai is a pioneering AI-first company on a mission to transform how humans discover and apply knowledge. For over a decade, we’ve built intelligent systems that empower researchers, engineers, and product teams to work faster and more precisely with scientific and technical data.Our product suite — Neuralith, Axion, and RSpace — supports end-to-end AI development, from data orchestration and retrieval to LLM evaluation and deployment. At the core of our work are Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines, LLM Evaluation Frameworks, and intelligent AI Agents that bring context-awareness, accuracy, and task-level reasoning to applied AI.Backed by the European Innovation Council (EIC) and trusted by leading R&D teams across industries, we turn advanced AI research into real-world tools that help organizations solve high-impact problems.OpportunityAs a Solution Architect at Iris.ai, you’ll join a remote-first, AI-native team focused on building production-ready systems powered by RAG, LLMs, and AI agents. You will play a pivotal role in shaping next-generation AI Agents that bring context-awareness, accuracy, and complex reasoning to real-world problems. You will work alongside our commercial, product and development teams to design, prototype, and deploy intelligent systems - leveraging our Neuralith, Axion, and RSpace products. Your focus will be to help leading Enterprise organizations find ways to apply Iris.ai's technologies to reach value generation in the shortest path possible.Technologies Used In The Job Include      Rapid prototyping tools (AI-Assisted Coding - Windsurf, Cursor, Flowise, Lovable, etc.)Cloud & Infrastructure (AWS/GCP/Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform)Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines (ChromaDB, SentenceEmbeddings, LLMs )AI Agent frameworks (Autogen)Machine Learning stacks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.)Backend & APIs (Python, Django, etc.)Git & CI / CD
What You’ll Do       Design end-to-end Agentic solutions based on Iris.ai’s products for our Enterprise clients: design modular pipelines that combine Data Ingestion, RAG, LLM evaluation, and autonomous decision-making into cohesive workflows that bring direct value to the client. Rapid prototyping - rapidly spin up proof-of-concepts, run benchmarks on accuracy and reasoning performance, and iterate based on real-world data with the client.Integration and deployment - You will collaborate with the Tech team to deliver, orchestrate, and monitor AI Agents in production environments.Engage in sessions with the Client - You will translate customer requirements into technical designs, run technical sessions with the Client, and provide best-practice guidance for AI adoption.Collaborate in a cross-dimensional team. Work closely with sales managers, product managers, engineers, designers and researchers to align architecture with product vision and user needs.Drive innovation by testing new approaches with the Clients and bringing new ideas to the product team.Focus client systems on performance and reliability, ensuring they are scalable, testable, and maintainableThrive in a remote-first, agile environment, contributing meaningfully within a distributed, deep-tech teamKeep learning, always — we’ll support you with space, mentorship, and resources to grow as an AI engineer
What You Need      5+ years in client facing product oriented jobs - ideally in AI/ML or data-driven platforms.Deep understanding of LLMs & RAG - 1+ year hands-on experience (prompt engineering / retrieval pipelines / evaluation metrics )Strong software engineering skills: profficeint in Python, API design, and microservicesCloud proficiency: designing and operating scalable services on AWS, GCP, or Azure.Solid experience in web development (Django/Flask/REST)Excellent communication: able to convey complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Problem-solver mindset: keen analytical skills, resourcefulness, and a drive to tackle ambiguous challenges.Ability to work in a remote-first, collaborative environmentProficiency in English
Any Of These Is An Advantage      Advanced degree in Computer Science or related fieldPrevious work with LLMs, NLP, or AI model evaluationCertification in cloud computingPrevious experience with deployment of RAG solutions in scalable production environmentOpen-source contributions, academic research, or mentoring
Life At Iris Offers🌍 Impact      Build responsible AI that shapes the future of science and techJoin a sharp, versatile team of ambitious buildersThrive in a flat structure with no corporate hierarchy, where every voice matters
💸 Compensation      Competitive salary with annual reviewsStock options to share in our long-term success
🌍Work Your Way      30 days annual paid vacation + bonus daysFlexible work hoursFlexible work location - You choose where to work fromHybrid model or 100% remote work - You want it? - You have it!Regular Team building activities and travelsSeasonal Working Camps (summer / winter)Personalized Work Equipment Allowance - choose your own Gear
🚀 Grow With Us      Learning & Development Allowance - we will sponsor you to Join global conferences or take upskilling courses Career Enhancement PlanNew technologies introduction & testing opportunitiesKnowledge transfer, Work buddies, PairCoding, Mentorship opportunities, weekly Tech Deep DivesWorkshops, Conferences, HackathonsFreedom to bring innovation and your ideas to life
🎁 Wellbeing & Perks      Free MultiSport cardCool Sofia office in a central locationPrivate Health Insurance - Premium packageBi-annual health checksCharity and volunteer activities
